summary: Highly motivated and results-oriented Software Engineer with 5 years of experience in developing and deploying scalable web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and various database technologies. Seeking to leverage expertise in a challenging role to contribute to innovative projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description:
• Led the development of a new microservices architecture, improving system scalability by 30%.
  • Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews, ensuring high code quality.
  • Collaborated with product teams to define requirements and deliver features on time.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description:
• Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
  • Implemented responsive user interfaces with React and Redux.
  • Participated in agile development cycles, contributing to sprint planning and retrospectives.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: • Specialized in Distributed Systems and Artificial Intelligence.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

projects.title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
projects.description: Led the front-end redesign of an existing e-commerce platform, improving user experience and conversion rates by 10%.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Developed a real-time chat application using WebSockets and React, supporting group chats and direct messaging.

awards.title: Employee of the Year
awards.description: Recognized for outstanding contributions to the customer dashboard project and mentorship of junior team members.
